text: The 1997 Pan American Women's Handball Championship was the fourth edition of the Pan American Women's Handball Championship, held in Brazil from 29 April to 4 May 1997. It acted as the American qualifying tournament for the 1997 World Women's Handball Championship. ==Preliminary round== \---- \---- \---- \---- ==Knockout stage== ===Third place game=== ===Final=== ==Final ranking== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=10px bgcolor=#ccffcc| ||Qualified for the 1997 World Championship |} {| class="wikitable" !Rank !Team |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:gold medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:silver medal icon.svg|| |-bgcolor=ccffcc |align=center|File:bronze medal icon.svg|| |- |align=center|4|| |- |align=center|5|| |- |align=center|6|| |} ==External links== *Results on todor66.com 1997 Women American Women's Handball Championship Pan Category:1997 in Brazilian women's sport Category:April 1997 sports events in South America Category:May 1997 sports events
title: 1997 Pan American Women's Handball Championship
